code: import axios from"axios";var instanse=axios.create({withCredentials:true,headers:{'API-KEY':'cafd4f76-51d0-40a7-93fa-907a2586d1e6'},baseURL:'https://social-network.samuraijs.com/api/1.0/'});export var userAPI={getUsers:function getUsers(currentPage,pageSize){return instanse.get("users?page=".concat(currentPage,"&count=").concat(pageSize)).then(function(response){return response.data;});},follow:function follow(userId){return instanse.post("follow/".concat(userId));},unfollow:function unfollow(userId){return instanse.delete("follow/".concat(userId));},getProfile:function getProfile(profileId){return profileAPI.getProfile(profileId);}};export var profileAPI={getProfile:function getProfile(profileId){return instanse.get("profile/".concat(profileId));},getStatus:function getStatus(profileId){return instanse.get("profile/status/".concat(profileId));},updateStatus:function updateStatus(status){return instanse.put("profile/status",{status:status});}};export var authAPI={getData:function getData(){return instanse.get("auth/me").then(function(response){return response.data;});},login:function login(email,password){var rememberMe=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:false;return instanse.post("auth/login",{email:email,password:password,rememberMe:rememberMe});},loginout:function loginout(){return instanse.delete("auth/login");}};
